detail.name: Men's 6" Premium Waterproof Boot
detail.description: Timberland's signature outdoor boots get a fresh coat of paint with these brightly-colored, rugged lace-ups.
detail.seoKeywords: Timberland, Timberland Men's 6" Premium Waterproof Boot
bulletText: Leather lining for comfort and durability

notes: Returns are accepted at any Macy's store within 180 days from purchase date. Last Act items must be returned within 30 days from purchase date.

reviews.title: My son Luvs it
reviews.reviewText:
Luv this boots easy purchase fast shipping!!!
My teenage son looks so cute in them..

reviews.title: All time classics
reviews.reviewText: I love these boots guys and I have been wearing them for years every time they get dirty I buy another pair.  They are comfortable and not too heavy on my foot. I wear them in winter, fall, spring and summer.

reviews.title: Great With Any Style
reviews.reviewText: it's a great boot that you can wear with just about anything

reviews.title: Hardworking shoes
reviews.reviewText: These boots were great, my husband loved them. He says that they keep his feet snug, warm and dry

reviews.title: Great Gift
reviews.reviewText: I gave these to my fiance as a birthday gift and he loves it. You can not go wrong with these classics it is almost a necessary must have in every New Yorkers closet lol goes great with many different outfit options and gives a clean look while keeping your feet dry.

reviews.title: He loves his boots
reviews.reviewText: Purchased as a gift. True to size. No complaints from him about his gift.

reviews.title: comfy Boot
reviews.reviewText: My son loves these boots. they fit true to size and he has a wide foot.

reviews.title: New school old school
reviews.reviewText: Excellent old school new school boot goes with everything like white air force 1 can't go wrong, but them and make a statement

reviews.title: My son is very happy with his Timbs!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these boots for my 19 year old son for Christmas. Lots of guys at college have these and since it's wintry weather in Ithaca NY right now, these are fantastic. He loves the style and they are perfect with jeans. Keeps his feet warm and dry while walking to class and around campus. My first job was working at Timberland Co in Newmarket NH where they make them. So a bit of nostalgia for me and pride that this dependable and high quality product is now on my son's feet! Fast shipping, received in just 3 days.

reviews.title: Comfort and style
reviews.reviewText: I love the Timberland boot, they are stylish yet the keep my feet warm, dry  and they are very comfortable.  I love getting them from Macy's because they usually have them at a better price and I can pick them up near my job from the store.

reviews.title: Great boots!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these boots for my  son as a Christmas Gift. He loves them!

reviews.title: great quality
reviews.reviewText: I buy a pair of these and use them for a whole decade. Great quality. Worth the money

reviews.title: Awesome boots
reviews.reviewText: These boots are very well made and are a little more fitted than the regular timberlands, since these are premium.

reviews.title: Great stylish boots
reviews.reviewText: Haven’t owned a pair in years. Way more comfy than they used to be. Runs half a size too large.

reviews.title: Excellent product
reviews.reviewText: Excellent product, water proof, we used it in the snow and hiking and they were very comfortable

reviews.title: Great fit
reviews.reviewText: I love the fit, it was just right. I ordered my 3 grandchildren a pair also. They love the boots.

reviews.title: Quality winter boots
reviews.reviewText: I have been a great supporter for this shoe , it’s great for all year round and especially when it’s cold and your toes want that comfort and warm feeling , I will always trust in a timberland

reviews.title: Quality purchase as always from Macy’s
reviews.reviewText: Macy’s has always a way to save on good quality purchases..

reviews.title: Great Purchase
reviews.reviewText: Excellent gift for my nephew!! He loves them! He was looking for those exact boots & he couldn't believe they had them at Macy's. He loves Macy's now because of them.

reviews.title: Christmas if for giving
reviews.reviewText: I gave my boyfriend these for Christmas and he cant seem to take them off. Perfect gift from my favorite place to my favorite person.
